Objectives


I want to obtain a customer service position where I can make the best use of my people oriented experience, communication skills and my problem analysis and problem solving abilities.

I'd also love the opportunity to learn new things and help assist with anything possible. I enjoy the process of being molded into the perfect employee the company needs me to be. Everything I do is a life experience and I'll be grateful to become a part of a company and learn the ins and outs so I can take what I’sve learned and use it to prosper further anywhere. Learning is very important to me at this time like this in my life and with the proper training I am ready to take what I learn and be successful within our company. I love meeting new people and I am a team player. I would love a position like this.
